name: Scratch a Sketch
description:
Hello thx for playing my game

This is my 2nd Game that I have made

Controls-PRESS SPACE TO DRAW

                      PRESS H,J TO CHANGE COLOUR

                     R TO EARSE

                     P TO SEE NICER

                     A TO HIDE PEN AND ADMIRE YOUR DRAWING AND S TO UNHIDE YOUR PEN

This project was inspire by A etch a Sketch -

If you have some problems write down in the Comments

Bye:D. Also the Original File will be in the download section
